actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 101-325.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 597.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States, Great Lakes trade, and fisheries for the vessel "Rose".

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.

titles.title: A bill to authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States, Great Lakes trade, and fisheries for the vessel "Rose".
